column5: I donÂ´t want to alarm anyone but it sounds like the LCBO may go on strike June 24th. http://www.torontosun.com/news/toron...0/9624731.html Just wanted to give a heads up so the guys that will be up there at that time can plan accordingly.
If you're coming up through Manitoba, buy your spirits and beer in Manitoba, it's cheaper.

After reading the article, I browsed on down the page to the first comment. There was certainly not validity to what he said. What next? Socialize the bait shops. Mean while, we may have to stock up, in case such a Provential crisis occurs. Steve
Would this include grocery stores and convenience stores which sell beer? I'm thinking Minaki and Nestor Falls.
I spoke with the manager of the LCBO in Ear Falls last week, and this affects LCBO's only. So The Beer Stores and other outlets will not be affected.
A post like that will drive a good man to drink!
